<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78005</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78005</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>2132c61d-3f4e-4003-ae2d-7b687027a5d8#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Egy vektor- több egyenes</string>
            <string language="en">One vector - more straight lines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Vektor - geradere Geraden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un vecteur - des lignes plus droites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um vetor - linhas mais retas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un vettore - linee rette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διάνυσμα - περισσότερες ευθείες γραμμές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un vector - líneas más rectas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Párhuzamos egyenesek közös irány- és normálvektorát szemléltető ábra</string>
            <string language="en">The demonstrating figure of the common direction vector and normal vector of parallel straight lines</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">vektor, egyenes</string>
            <string language="en">vector, straight line</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die zeigende Abbildung des geläufigen Richtung 
Vektors und des normalen Vektors der parallelen geraden Geraden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure démontrante du vecteur commun de 
direction et du vecteur normal des lignes droites parallèles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura demonstrando do vetor comum do sentido e
do vetor normal de linhas retas paralelas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura di dimostrazione del vettore comune di 
senso e del vettore normale delle linee rette parallele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καταδεικνύοντας αριθμός του κοινού διανυσματικού και
κανονικού διανύσματος κατεύθυνσης των παράλληλων ευθειών γραμμών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura que demuestra del vector común de la 
dirección y del vector normal de líneas rectas paralelas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektor, gerade Gerade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur, ligne droite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor, linha reta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vettore, linea retta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διανυσματική, ευθεία γραμμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vector, línea recta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>790</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78005</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=2132c61d-3f4e-4003-ae2d-7b687027a5d8&v=1&b=3</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
